ExecutableTestSuite.label: name
ExecutableTestSuite.description: This test was generated automatically from a Schema profile in haleconnect
ExecutableTestSuite.author: author

ParameterList.name: ETF Standard Parameters for XML test objects

TestModule.label: Default test module
TestModule.description: This is the default test module

TestCase.label: TestCase label
TestCase.description: Constraints TestCase for Feature Type with name 'organisationName' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd'

TestAssertion.label: TestAssertion
TestAssertion.description: The property with localName 'CharacterString' and namespace 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gco' should have a value that is contained in the list ['2', 'value1']
TestAssertion.expression: let $messages := (for $record in $db let $typesFound := $record//*[local-name()='myType' and namespace-uri()='simple.schema'] for $typeFound in $typesFound let $countChoice1 := count($typeFound/*[local-name()='firstChoice' and namespace-uri()='simple.schema']) let $countChoice2 := count($typeFound/*[local-name()='secondChoice' and namespace-uri()='simple.schema']) return if (($countChoice1 + $countChoice2) lt 1) then local:addMessage('TR.missingMandatoryTypeError', map { 'localName': 'propertyName1', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd1' }) else if (($countChoice1 + $countChoice2) gt 1) then local:addMessage('TR.missingMandatoryTypeError', map { 'localName': 'propertyName2', 'namespace': 'http://www.isotc211.org/2005/gmd2' }) else () )[position() le $limitErrors] return (if ($messages) then 'FAILED' else 'PASSED', local:error-statistics('TR.recordsWithErrors', count(fn:distinct-values($messages//etf:argument[@token='id']/text()))), $messages)
